Description: Body sherd of Chian Mature Animal Style pottery chalice; white slip; interior: glazed streaky brown; part of lotus flower in added white outline with added red centre; below, chevron band between pairs of white lines; exterior surface completely worn.
Curator's comments: The sherd probably belongs to the same vessel as British Museum 1924,1201.556, 1924,1201.635 and 1965,0930.397.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.0553) (phase 2)
